```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets) 
data("brfss_smart2010")
```
```{r}
dict_resp = c("Excellent", 
              "Very good",
              "Good",
              "Fair",
              "Poor")

brfss_df = brfss_smart2010 |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  filter(topic == "Overall Health" & response == dict_resp)

  brfss_df$response |> as.factor()
```
